title: Advanced Greedy Algorithm Problems
description: Explore more complex greedy algorithm problems such as Huffman Coding and Fractional Knapsack.
data:
### Advanced Greedy Algorithms
In this article, we discuss advanced greedy algorithm problems that are commonly used in interviews and competitive programming.

#### Huffman Coding
Huffman coding is a lossless data compression algorithm used to assign variable-length codes to characters based on their frequencies.
